website_summaries.verdict: The latest iPhone with massive performance and camera improvements.
pros: Perfect for classic iOS fans who use their phone for everything in their life, especially photos
Large screen and big upgrades on battery life and privacy as well
Not just water-resistant, it goes underwater
cons: Long-term effects on battery life and overall functionality have yet to be discovered

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bummer how expensive it is, but I really enjoy this phone and i don’t regret buying :) it’s only four stars instead of five because of the price. Realistically if you don’t care about camera quality, any other smartphone will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue but it was resolved very quickly. I hope they checked future products because mines was sent with a Pro Max barcode on the plastic but if you read the box itself it reads Pro. Customer service was very helpful in helping me with my replacement it shipped and delivered in one day. This new iPhone didn’t seem to cost so much anymore once I’m allowed to make monthly installments on it I’m very happy about that promotion so I definitely took advantage of it, very blessed! I also liked the Cricket promotion I basically save 5$ a month now going thru Amazon so I’m very pleased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: On

customer_reviews.title: phone not working I will cancell payment and make no further purchasses
customer_reviews.text: The phone does not work needs ssimcard. cannot be unlockedd without a PASSWORD? I was informed that this phome was made in China, I do not like thinks from China IO cannot use the phone without the needed SIM CARD
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bellas

customer_reviews.text: When I got it the whole screen was cracked and they didn’t even have its camera

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Scam . Not a Pro Max it’s the Pro meaning the small one . The subscription doesn’t work it cancelled off my account and I’m not rebuying another one. Don’t waste your money it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Amazon should side with a wireless company from cricket
customer_reviews.text: I love the apple iphone 11 pro max just the wireless connection with cricket is a disaster they refuse from giving insurance for the iphone max pro 11 and the insurance through apple are too mush $280 every year and you have too pay it one time
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: I had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.text: I was scared because of the bad reviews, but it came in perfect conditions, it works, it's the iPhone 11 pro max!! Nothing else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Very great quality
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very great, the cameras work really good
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Returning phone
customer_reviews.text: No SD card slot to extend the memory for photos, videos, games. For me that's makes such a purchase a waste of money,
customer_reviews.author: Widower62

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: It was liked and it would not go into the Home Screen I could not log in to the phone
